titles.title: A resolution recognizing the contributions of Hispanic and Latino Americans to the musical heritage of the United States and designating May 2024 as "Latin Music Appreciation Month".
A resolution recognizing the contributions of Hispanic and Latino Americans to the musical heritage of the United States and designating May 2024 as "Latin Music Appreciation Month".

action.text: Referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.

bill.summary: This resolution designates May 2024 as Latin Music Appreciation Month.
